name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep Safe For PC, Windows and Mac Download

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your online security with Keepsafe for PC, Windows, and Mac. Verify emails, block websites, and generate strong passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep Safe For PC, Windows, and Mac Extension is your go-to tool for enhancing online security. With three essential features, it's a breeze to check if an email is disposable or not, block unwanted websites, and create strong passwords. Stay safe and surf with confidence using Keepsafe!

✔ Extension Features:

1) Email Verification: Quickly determine if an email is disposable or permanent, helping you make informed communication choices.

2) Website Blocking: Block any websites you find distracting or harmful, allowing for a more focused and secure browsing experience.

3) Password Generator: Create strong and unique passwords effortlessly, fortifying your online accounts against potential threats.

✔ How to Use?

Step 1: Add the Keep Safe for PC, Windows, and Mac extension to your Google Chrome browser.

Step 2: Click on the extension icon, and you will see the Keep Safe extension features.

Step 3: You will found the 3 Tab, One is, Verify email, 2nd is Blocked website, 3rd is, password generator.

Step 4:Use and Enjoy!

In conclusion, our Keepsafe Chrome extension equips you with essential tools to enhance your online experience. With email verification, website blocking, and password generation at your disposal, you can navigate the digital world with confidence and security. Stay protected and in control with Keepsafe.

✔ Disclamer:

Please note that "Keep Safe for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Keep Safe Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Keep Safe Android app.
